VIDEOS

A History Of ‘SNL’ Romance

Ariana Grande, Scarlett Johansson, Emma Stone, Ben Affleck, Carrie Fisher and Elisabeth Moss and are just some of the celebrities who found love on the set of “Saturday Night Live.”
